title: My Sh*t Shovel Officer is Cute - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Buddhism   Caring Protagonist   Chuunibyou   Clever Protagonist   Clingy Lover   College/University   Cute Protagonist   Demons   Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Handsome Male Lead   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Modern Day   Movies   Mysterious Past   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Pets   Pill Based Cultivation   Protagonist Falls in Love First
author: 泥胖胖
description:
[The 17-year-old genius hacker died in his house naked, the truth turned out to be…]

Xiao Luo became famous when he was young and his life went smoothly. Until after taking a bath, he slipped, fell to his death and got attached to a little orange cat that just turned full moon. 
He was then brought back by Ling Su, a talented person in the financial department of W University, and started the leisurely days of eating, sleeping and training the shoveling officer..(?)

However-

Master said: Xiao Luo, your “death” is the malicious revenge of the monster. Follow your sh*t shovel officer and protect him. He is your most important person.

Since then, Xiao Luo’s three views have been constantly refreshed, and he has begun a sweet journey of relying on the system to collect points and transform into monsters to protect his beloved man!

A: Ling Su, the Department of Art has spent the evening with you to watch a movie…

Ling Su: Xiaopang is waiting for me in the dormitory.

Some B: Ling Su, we're all going to dinner together…

Ling Su: Xiaopang is waiting for me in the dormitory.

Certain C: Ling Su, don’t forget to take me to the master tonight!

Ling Su: I have to ask Xiaopang.

Xiao Luo: Don’t call me Xiaopang! Ling Su, your uncle, you don’t want to sleep in bed tonight!

Ling Su: Xiaopang, why are you wetting the bed again?>
